document.full_text: in their 50-season history, the mets have retired only one number for one of their players: tom seaver's no. 41. such restraint is admirable, perhaps, compared with the yankees. but what about gary carter's no. 8?
document.title: should the mets retire gary carter's no. 8?
lines_and_colors: in their 50-season history, the mets have retired only one number for one of their players: tom seaver's no. 41. such restraint is admirable, perhaps, compared with the yankees. but what about gary carter's no. 8?
